body: A Brooklyn actor who had a role this season in the HBO series ''The Sopranos'' was sentenced to two to six years in prison yesterday for selling $300,000 in worthless stock to elderly people. The man, Thomas Bifalco Jr., 26, of Bath Beach, Brooklyn, was sentenced in State Supreme Court in Manhattan for defrauding more than 30 elderly victims, the
title: Metro Business; Actor in 'Sopranos' Is Sentenced in Scam
